page.title: 16EVENTS: TWINNING
page.content: {Potton}is hoping to twin with a small town in{Germany}called{Langenlonsheim. We are twinning with Langenlonsheim because Potton and Langenlonsheim are simlilar to each other in size. Many people from Langenlonsheim are coming to Potton on the{18th July {1985.}Half of the Market Square is going to be shut off because there will be a lot of people and a band to welcome the visitors from Germany. Many shops will be decorated with flags. People from both towns will, in future, be able to visit each other and new{friendships}will be made.
